comments:
Details:
Dynamic image running error

Step:
1. New a datasource and dataset contain image.
2. Insert a table and bending the dataset, generate all the column.
3. Insert a image

Actual result:
If the image doesn't bending the dataset, it is OK. But if the image bending the dataset again, it will error.

Exception result:
If the image bending the dataset again, it can judge and preview right.

Actually such a usage is not recommended, since only first image will be repeated many times, which is determined by outer table. The main bug by now is we will get binary stream error when access data base, and we are not sure what the real problem is. But for the normal usage, there is no error.

When I try to reproduce this bug, I found Engine does not support the column binding in dynamic image. It will throw exception as follows:
There are error(s) in Image : 75

After engine fixed the exception bug, If the image still cannot show correctly, please reassign this bug to me. Thanks!

Since GUI has modified the binding generator, this bug has been resolved.BTW, if user binds a data item on itself, this will generate another query,which is not related to the out_table.So in preview layout, user will only see the first datarow of each data item.
